title: What is the interpretation of a woman traveling in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Traveling in a dream for a married womanTravel is one of the beautiful dreams of some people, especially men, but sometimes we find women who want to travel and move to a new land and a different world, and therefore they feel very excited if they see her traveling in the dream, as well as some things related to it, such as a bag or a passport, and if A married woman found traveling in a dream, so she should follow us through our article to find out the meaning of this dream. Traveling in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a married woman could be an expression of her dreams that are constantly renewed, because she has many goals and is making a good effort to get closer to achieving them. If the woman walks On a trip, and her road was clear or good, and she did not suffer from any problems during that, it can be said that she is facing the crises that she is facing, and from here the solution is close to her. Even if the woman is unstable with her husband and she sees travel, the dream shows her extended diet, whether it is Materially or emotionally, that is, there is a major change in their circumstances. Traveling in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin touches on the fact that a woman’s trip in a dream is a happy event for her, especially if she desired it and it actually happened in the dream, because there is a major change in most Bad circumstances, in addition to various aspirations that soon appear in front of her, so much that she was able to earn a living. Ibn Sirin confirms that the meaning of a dream about travel depends on many things. Traveling by plane indicates its proximity to goodness and goodness, while using a car shows the speed of reaching one’s goals and if The woman faced some obstacles and unhappiness. Perhaps her relationship with some of those around her, including her husband, and God knows best. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, use Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Traveling in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman wants to know the meaning of traveling in dream and is trying to link the meaning of the vision to her birth, then we will explain to her that it will be easy and far from consequences and harm, God willing, except for the abundance of livelihood that the new baby brings her when he comes to this world. In some cases, a pregnant woman sees that she is traveling, but the road is very difficult and harmful to her and causes her or Her family is under great pressure and exhaustion, and from here it can be confirmed that these are the difficult days that she suffers from, but if she finally reaches the desired path, the difficult and harmful matters will turn into comfort and peace, God willing. The most important interpretations of traveling in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about traveling by plane in a dream for a married womanWhen A woman uses an airplane to travel and be able to reach the place she wants. The dream can be considered a welcome sign for the various achievements that she meets on earth, in addition to the fact that riding a plane for her is a symbol of you approaching God - Glory be to Him - with all goodness and refusing to disobey Him, even if it is A working woman approaches a good and distinguished job and achieves it

title: Interpretation of a dream about engagement with a specific person: I dreamed that I was engaged to a friend of mine

preview.html: Contents: A dream about an engagement in the dream of a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man and a single man, the engagement of someone I know, known or unknown, seeing my ex-fiancé or my fiancé. The Beloved and more from Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul Interpretation of a dream about engagement If a virgin girl sees herself engaged in a dream by someone she knows, this means that she will receive happy news from or about this person. The engaged woman in the dream rejoices in the days of her youth, preserves her honor, acquires knowledge, and is loved by others, so if she gets married Her husband is good and pious. The girl’s engagement in a dream indicates the girl’s marriage to a good man without celebration or joy, even if it is a Friday, indicating blessing, mercy, and goodness. Whoever sees in her dream that her engagement has been completed, then she must marry a man of high status. Important: In general, getting engaged in a dream is a vision that generates optimism. Every virgin girl or married woman sees in her dream an engagement or engagement, and this requires happiness and joy. If young people dream that they are engaged, this means that they will not receive special admiration. A dream about severing an engagement indicates that a quick action will take place. Being reckless in an important matter, or disappointments, may follow this dream. The dream is a sign of the dreamer’s thoughts about his family life, marriage, and his thoughts about an organized life, and for this reason he forms the marital nest because of his desire to experience these beautiful feelings. It expresses the experience of some beautiful and good developments And goodness and an increase in his share in professional and private life, and the door to wealth opens for him. You dream that you are engaged in a dream, then this dream indicates sudden and positive events and the dreamer will begin to live a more comfortable and beautiful life and will face some events that will make him a happy person. By seeing that you are engaged to someone in the dream Many events will occur in the dreamer's life that will make you happy and feel comfortable, and the dreamer will feel like a light person after getting rid of his worries. When seeing someone's engagement in a dream, some things will happen in the dreamer's life that will make him happy and he will receive news from the people he loves that will make him feel comfortable. When seeing a friend's engagement in... In a dream, the owner of this vision will witness the success of the friend he sees in the dream, and the friend’s life will develop well and he will be a happy person. When you see your brother’s engagement in a dream, your brother will make some decisions regarding his future and life, and you will take some steps and achieve your goals and you will get a lot of help from your brother and you will notice Great support from him. When seeing the engagement of your old lover in a dream, the dreamer will meet his girlfriend and talk about the events and situations that occurred in his life. Being engaged in a dream indicates that the person who sees his engagement in the dream will face an organized life. It will be an assistant for some other sex. The dreamer will achieve an organized life. He will be a successful man in his professional life. As a result, his financial income will increase and he will be relieved of financial burdens. For single people, it indicates many good things at the same time, which indicates that his life is linked to a person from an Islamic point of view who is strong in faith and does not fall short.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a taxi in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of a taxi in a dream, interpretation of a taxi in a dream, single, married, pregnant and male, meaning of a taxi, taxi symbol, directions to get off and taxi or rent. The language of the car is one of the vehicles we use to move quickly and frequently from one place to another . Seeing a taxi or a taxi accident in a dream will certainly have many meanings and interpretations. In this article, we will talk about these meanings and interpretations through a detailed explanation of the taxi in the dream, and driving a car indicates safety and comfort after fatigue and the fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of seeing a taxi in a dream: Interpretation of a taxi dream in a dream is one of the ideal ideas, because it shows that many positive changes and changes Radical in a person's life for the betterSee the evidenceA taxi with a smile in his dream is evidence of the presence of good friends and loyal and loyal friends. The dream of driving a taxi in a dream proves that the dreamer behind me has a strong character, and can take responsibility and make the right decisions. Interpretation of a white taxi in a dream is a sign of comfort Psychological, calm, stability, and peace of mind. The dream of seeing a taxi in a dream indicates ambition, desire, and success in achieving the ideal goal. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing an ambulance in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a taxi for a single woman: Seeing a taxi. Fasting in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of a strict and firm decision in Her life. In the dream of an unmarried woman, dreaming of an old taxi indicates bad luck and may also indicate that she married an unworthy person. To see an unknown driver working with a taxi in the dream of an unmarried girl, proves that you are traveling in a nearby place and moving to another place A dream about a taxi and a dream about a woman prove that he will lose an emotional relationship, but after that it will end and you will feel happy. The interpretation of a taxi for a single girl indicates happiness, psychological stability, and peace of mind. The dream of seeing a taxi accident in a single woman’s dream indicates misfortunes and disasters that will befall her. Read also: Interpretation Dreams to see a taxi in a dreamInterpretation of visiting a taxi for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream TaxiThe news in a married woman’s dream indicates that she lives a happy and stable life with her husband and maintains a loving and respectful relationship together. A married woman seeing a taxi that she leaves in a dream indicates that he has lost many opportunities and needs to Seize the upcoming opportunities. A married woman’s view of taxi collisions in a dream indicates that she is suffering from many problems and disagreements with her husband and may end up in divorce. A dream about seeing a taxi waiting for a married woman in a dream indicates that she will receive a lot of good news in the future. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tractors in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a taxi for a pregnant woman: The taxi dreamed by a pregnant woman is evidence of the upcoming birth date, which will be natural, easy, and guarantee the safety of the newborn. In the months

title: Interpretation of seeing a church: Seeing a church in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: ChurchEntering a church for a Muslim in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a priest in a dream by Ibn SirinThe church in an individual’s dreamInterpretation of seeing Christians in a dreamLeaving a church in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a wedding in a churchSeeing a church and a mosque in a dreamWedding in a church in a dreamInterpretation of a church in a dreamThe church is a sign of success and the fulfillment of a wish. The monastery in a dream is a high status, and the priest is a happy man. Around him, the cross is a Christian marriage and healing. Sick people.Interpretation of the entrance to a church in a dream: Entering a church in a dream is a sign of joy coming to you, and an unmarried woman entering a church means her engagement, and a married woman entering a church is a sign of pregnancy. You want God. Interpretation of leaving the church in a dreamLeaving the church in a dream is a sign of travel and a sign of alienation and the pursuit of livelihood or knowledge, and Ibn Sirin says that the dream of leaving the church is a sign of reaching the seed. The monastery in a dream The monastery in a dream has a high status and entering it is a sign of wealth And healing, as they said that the monastery symbolizes the good of unmarried people and is work or work for the unemployed, and the monastery in dreams is a good omen. For a Muslim or a Christian, for a man or a woman. Interpretation of a priest or soothsayer in a dream: A priest, soothsayer, or a Christian soothsayer is a person close to you who makes you happy, provides you with assistance, and illuminates your way or path. It is for the married person and the only person who takes care of him. . The pregnant woman has good news and joy. Interpretation of the church bell in a dream. The church bell in a dream is a warning that something very important and a great danger will happen, and it foretells to the dreamer that something will happen on the public level, such as the death of a public figure or something like that, and the church bell of freedom is a man. A wealthy person seeks it. Interpretation of a wedding in a church or cathedral. Marriage in a church indicates the steadfastness of the man and the steadfastness of the woman and indicates the purchase of a house or a home. title: What is the interpretation of seeing the Antichrist in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of the Antichrist by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the vision of the Antichrist in a dream is evidence of forbidden money taken by the fortuneteller. If one sees in a dream that he is laughing out loud with the Antichrist, this means bankruptcy and losing a lot of money. The interpretation of the dream of walking with the Antichrist is evidence that the dreamer is walking On the forbidden path and must return to Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Antichrist for a single woman. If a girl sees the Antichrist in a dream, this indicates that there is someone in her life who wants to control her. The Antichrist in a girl’s dream is a sign of envy and the evil eye that afflicts her. If she sees That she married the Antichrist, this vision is not good. The Antichrist in a girl’s dream indicates lies and deception. Interpretation of the vision of the Antichrist for a married woman: If she sees that she is accepted as an enemy of Christ in the dream, this indicates that she will fall in love with someone who wants to destroy her life. The Antichrist in a dream indicates A married woman is to fall into temptation. If she sees the Antichrist inside her home, this indicates the many problems she faces. Seeing the Antichrist in her bedroom indicates that there are people interfering in her life who want to destroy her. Seeing the Antichrist for a pregnant womanSeeing in a dream that he is kissing the AntichristWomen Being pregnant Evidence of the problems she is exposed to at the time of childbirth. If she sees that she is hosting the Antichrist in her home, this indicates fears and troubles, but they will end soon. To see a pregnant woman, the Antichrist, carrying her child, means that she is facing problems and a great conflict that she will fall into. A dream about the Antichrist For a man to see the Antichrist laughing loudly, this indicates many problems. If he sees the Antichrist laughing at home in a dream, this indicates a loss of money. In a dream the Antichrist appears to be eating, this indicates a tight diet. Seeing the Antichrist laughing In a man’s dream, it indicates sudden death. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article, and we will answer it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing a perfume bottle in a dream and what it indicates

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bottle of perfume in a dream, and what seeing perfume in a dream indicates, indicates abundance of sustenance, abundance of goodness for the dreamer, and good news. This indicates a beautiful wife and happy new news, and a bottle of perfume indicates the girl’s marriage to a young man of good character, and seeing perfume in a married woman’s dream indicates a fragrant biography and her good relationships with those around her, and intertwined. Family relationships, as evidenced by spraying perfume in a dream. The dreamer is adept at managing his life's affairs and good at planning them. Follow us next. Seeing a bottle of perfume for Nabulsi: Perfume in a dream is a good dream that indicates good news and a decent life. Also, seeing the gift of perfume suggests a new life. If a young man sees this vision, this indicates the approaching marriage. Seeing a gift of perfume in a dream for a girl indicates the approaching engagement. Seeing a woman spraying perfume on her body in a dream indicates the success of marital relations and her husband’s love for her. Spraying perfume for a girl on her body indicates the approaching marriage. Seeing A bottle of perfume for a woman. Perfume in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is a good woman, that her behavior is good among people, and that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing that she is buying perfume indicates her love for her husband and the good relationship between them, friendliness and compassion. Smelling perfume indicates her righteousness, the good of her children, and the good of her life. Looking at a bottle Perfume for a man: A good smell and a good smell in general indicate goodness and abundant living and money, and for a man it is a good vision and progress at work. Seeing him smelling the scent of perfume also indicates success and success in his professional life and joining a prestigious job. As for a young man, smelling an aromatic scent indicates his marriage to A beautiful and kind girl. Seeing a bottle of perfume for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman is seen wearing perfume, this indicates her good behavior among people. It also indicates her ex-husband’s desire to return to him. Seeing and smelling perfume indicates her marriage to a good man. If you see a bottle of perfume in a dream, this means that you You will hear good news soon. A bottle of perfume for a married woman indicates a safe and stable life, and for a pregnant woman it indicates the approaching birth, the ease of childbirth and the joy of the newborn. If a girl sees this, it indicates her marriage to a good man. Seeing a bottle of perfume and the sex of the fetus. Perfume for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates a safe pregnancy. Perfume It also suggests joy and happiness. A bottle of perfume indicates the birth of a beautiful girl. A perfume seller in a dream indicates good news, happy occasions, and joys. As for whoever sees that he is buying perfume to give her as a gift in the dream, this indicates the kindness of the dreamer, the appearance of good deeds, and abundant praise. It may represent a vision The gift of perfume in a dream is a reminder to others of kindness and seeking goodness. Whoever sees that he works in a perfume shop declares that he praises people and treats them with kindness and good treatment. Making perfume in a dream means choosing beautiful words, telling people and good manners. Seeing a bottle of perfume in a dream Seeing an unmarried girl buying perfume in Her dreams indicate her marriage to a well-meaning and elegant young man. Buying perfume in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will soon become pregnant. And in a dream, buying perfume in a dream, for

As for a young man, smelling an aromatic scent indicates his marriage to A beautiful and kind girl. Seeing a bottle of perfume for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman is seen wearing perfume, this indicates her good behavior among people. It also indicates her ex-husband’s desire to return to him. Seeing and smelling perfume indicates her marriage to a good man. If you see a bottle of perfume in a dream, this means that you You will hear good news soon. A bottle of perfume for a married woman indicates a safe and stable life, and for a pregnant woman it indicates the approaching birth, the ease of childbirth and the joy of the newborn. If a girl sees this, it indicates her marriage to a good man. Seeing a bottle of perfume and the sex of the fetus. Perfume for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates a safe pregnancy. Perfume It also suggests joy and happiness. A bottle of perfume indicates the birth of a beautiful girl. A perfume seller in a dream indicates good news, happy occasions, and joys. As for whoever sees that he is buying perfume to give her as a gift in the dream, this indicates the kindness of the dreamer, the appearance of good deeds, and abundant praise. It may represent a vision The gift of perfume in a dream is a reminder to others of kindness and seeking goodness. Whoever sees that he works in a perfume shop declares that he praises people and treats them with kindness and good treatment. Making perfume in a dream means choosing beautiful words, telling people and good manners. Seeing a bottle of perfume in a dream Seeing an unmarried girl buying perfume in Her dreams indicate her marriage to a well-meaning and elegant young man. Buying perfume in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will soon become pregnant. And in a dream, buying perfume in a dream, for

title: Interpretation of dreams for a young man who wants to marry me and sees a man who wants to marry me

preview.html: Contents: A dream of a man asking to marry me A young man asking for my hand A person asking me to marry A strange man who wants to marry me Interpretation of the person who wants to marry in a dream If the dream comes true, then either you have rejected more than one person who has gotten to know you, perhaps because you have qualities that you want or dream of that you did not find in them. Or That there is someone who truly loves you and wishes for you, but you do not accept him, and God knows best. If you dream that someone wants to propose to you, this indicates hope and optimism, because whoever proposes to her, you feel hope and optimism in life. If you dream that someone wants to propose to you and you reject the engagement of a young man, then this It means that something will happen that will make you optimistic and happy. For a married woman who sees a stranger who wants to marry or marry her, the dream indicates that God will bring her closer to her husband for a long time, God willing, and she will be happy about this matter. Usually, dreaming of a marriage proposal in a dream means that some things that You manage it does not go well and may get worse. The dream is based on the other person in the dream asking to marry you. If you love him and desire him, the dream may mean that it is just a reflection of desires, but if there are no feelings between you, it may mean that you do not trust opinions And manage his affairs. But to be honest, the dream of a marriage proposal is usually with us in negative psychology. Either you are dealing with it in the wrong way, or you do not know what to do with one of the problems you are in. In another interpretation of the girl, it came: “My dear sister, you are going through In adolescence. You imagine that everyone who looks at you is in fact a fan, then you deal with him and think about him, God willing, at the appropriate time. You will have a good husband, but you must pray and ask for forgiveness. Marriage will inevitably come, but be patient.” I dreamed of a man who wants to get married in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surah Aziz in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams and seeing surahs of the Holy Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. A dream, the Great Qur’an in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about seeing the walls of the Great Qur’an in a dream, the dream of seeing the walls of the Great Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about seeing the walls of the beloved Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi to learn more on the Al-Mozat website. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Aziz in a dream. A dream of a married, single, and pregnant woman. Scientists have interpreted the vision of reciting several surahs from the Qur’an, and one of the most prominent of these interpretations is that reading Surat Ibrahim in a dream indicates that this person will be relieved of worry and sadness. Surat Al-Aziz in a dream by Ibn Sirin. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat Al-Ikhlas, then this It indicates that he will prolong his life, and that he will bury all of his family members. Reading Surat Al-Aziz in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. As for whoever sees himself reading Surat Al-Atakadur in a dream, this indicates that this person cares about the affairs of this world and does not care about the matters of the hereafter. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Allah, This indicates that it will affect the afterlife in this world. preview.html: The appearance of bees in a dream carries many interpretations and interpretations, so a large number of people in the past period wanted to know the meanings of this dream and its interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a bee attacking in a dream for one girl Seeing a bee in a dream for an unmarried girl has many connotations and meanings, which are as follows: If it is a girl An unmarried woman dreams of being attacked by bees, this means that she will get married soon, God willing. This vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that bring goodness and joy to individual life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is being attacked by bees, this is evidence of her purity and the beauty of her conduct. Subjectivity. Bees symbolize beauty and good morals. Also, seeing bees in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her psychological and emotional stability in her afterlife, and God knows best. Seeing bees in a dream may indicate the date of the next marriage, and this marriage will be happy. But if an unmarried girl sees A married queen bee in her dream, this indicates that her marriage is very close, and God knows best. Finally, if a single woman sees a bee stinging in her dream, this indicates that there are pleasant events that will come to her soon. You can learn more through: Interpretation of seeing bees in The dream and its meaningInterpretation of a dream about a bee in a dream for a married woman. We will explain the interpretation of this dream for a married woman, which is as follows: If a married woman dreams that bees attack her, this is evidence of her success. But if a married woman sees in her dream that bees attacked her and she ran away from them, then this is evidence of her success in her married life. And professionalism. This dream brings her good news that all her wishes will come true and she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Also, seeing bees in a dream can mean that a married woman’s life is full of happiness, peace and comfort. Interpretation of seeing a bee attack in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a bee in a dream for a pregnant woman carries several interpretations. They are as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that bees attack and kill her, this indicates that she has committed some acts of corruption. However, if she sees bees in her dream, this means the birth of a boy, and the birth will be easy and simple, God willing. Finally, seeing bees in a dream is evidence of ease. Pregnancy and childbirth and that the child will be healthy. Interpretation of a dream about a bee attack in a dream by the Nabulsi scholar. The great scholar Al-Nabulsi explained the vision of a bee in a dream with different explanations and interpretations, namely: Al-Nabulsi explained that bees in a dream indicate the presence of kindness and abundant food for the dreamer. It is also evidence of obtaining money. Halal is abundant, and this vision is praiseworthy. And if a person sees in his dream that there are a number of bees attacking him, this means that there is a large number of enemies lurking to defeat him. Whereas if someone sees in his dream that he is eating honey from the hive, and he ate the entire quantity without leaving Something for the bees. This is evidence that the dreamer is persecuting people and depriving them of their rights, and this is according to the interpretation of the scholar Al-Nabulsi. If a person sees in a dream that he was able to escape from the bees that attacked him, this is evidence of the success of

title: Interpretation of seeing a crime in a dream and committing a crime

preview.html: Seeing a crime in a dream symbolizes distress and anguish, and anyone who sees himself committing a murder in a dream is committing a great sin, and seeing murder in a dream means that you are going through great distress, and if you see that you are committing a crime in a dream, it indicates the restoration of rights to his people and the end of injustice, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a crime in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a crime in a dream as going through troubles and hardships. Seeing a crime and revealing it in a dream means that you are commanded to do good, but whoever sees a crime and hides it in a dream, this means keeping silent about evil and not concealing sin and seeing a relative killed in a dream. It indicates severing ties with them, but seeing a family member killed in a dream indicates disobeying parents. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a crime in a dream indicates harm and harm, and perhaps it portends calamity and loss of blessings, and whoever sees that he killed a man and carried him in a dream, he demands a fine and harms him according to the weight and lightness of the bag. The dream of someone who wants to perform the Hajj indicates that he will achieve his will and goals, and for the patient, it is evidence of his recovery and seeing the king committing a crime against his flock. And free their necks. Gustav Miller says that seeing a murder in a dream indicates indifference in the field of work and error with friends, and the dream of murder indicates participation in an act that defames the reputation of the seer, and whoever sees his enemies killing him in a dream, they want evil and conspire against him. He goes through great distress. And God knows best. The meaning of committing a crime in a dream Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees himself committing a murder in a dream commits a great sin. Seeing yourself committing a crime other than slaughter in a dream means the good that will happen to the murdered person. Whoever sees that he has committed a crime intentionally in a dream is a sinner and ungrateful for the blessing, and seeing an unintended crime in a dream is an indication of paying off debts and fulfilling the trust. If you see that you have committed a murder and confessed to it in a dream, this indicates gaining goodness, power, prestige and security, while the dream of killing and denial indicates extreme fear. Seeing yourself committing a murder for the sake of God in a dream means profit, trade and fulfilling a promise, and seeing a child committing a murder in a dream means obtaining alimony and allowances, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of witnessing a murder Watching a murder in a dream means that you are going through severe pain and severe distress. Whoever sees that he has witnessed a murder with a bullet in a dream, he hears words that contain insults and belittling the situation, and the dream of witnessing a murder with a gun indicates problems and fears, and seeing a murder with a machine gun in a dream indicates insult Reputation and price. Whoever sees himself killed and knows his killer in a dream, he will gain goodness and power. However, if you see yourself killed and do not know your killer in a dream, this means denying blessings and goodness. Seeing a woman killing her husband in a dream means that she is holding her husband in sin, and seeing a mother killing her son in a dream indicates serious injustice and deprivation of rights. Interpretation of seeing murder in a dream. Seeing murder with a knife in a dream Seeing murder with a knife in a dream shows injustice
